Monologue.Current: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.
Monologue.Original: 〖Save Point〗{Line} Access the Menu and select{Line}[Save] to save your game.

Monologue.Current: // Из Баламба в Тимбер{Line}{Char Selphie}{Line}“Потрясный поезд!”

Monologue.Original: Selphie{Line}“I’m gonna go check out the front.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“This transcontinental train{Line} goes all over the world.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“This transcontinental train{Line} goes all over the world.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Большую часть пути до Тимбера{Line} он преодолевает под водой,{Line} в специальном туннеле.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“It even runs through an{Line} underwater tunnel to get to Timber.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“If we really wanted to, we could even take{Line} a trip around the world on this luxury train.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“If we really wanted to, we could even take{Line} a trip around the world on this luxury train.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“I guess you don’t appreciate it.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“I guess you don’t appreciate it.”
{Char Squall}{Line}“Ok, we can go inside now.”
Zell{Line}“Let’s go check it out, {Char Squall}.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Кстати, {Char Squall}...{Line} чтобы войти в купе,{Line} надо воспользоваться билетом.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“By the way, {Char Squall}...{Line} You have to use the ticket to get inside.”

Monologue.Current: Train Announcement{Line}“This train, bound for East Academy,{Line} will depart shortly.”
Monologue.Original: Train Announcement{Line}“This train, bound for East Academy,{Line} will depart shortly.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Weren’t you just saying something?”{Line}It’s nothing important, but...{Line}Forget it... It’s not important
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Weren’t you just saying something?”{Line}It’s nothing important, but...{Line}Forget it... It’s not important

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“I have to thank{Line} Zone for that.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I have to thank{Line} Zone for that.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“We should get there shortly,{Line} so we’ll be all right out here.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“We should get there shortly,{Line} so we’ll be all right out here.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“No time even to rest, really.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“No time even to rest, really.”

Monologue.Current: (Selphie might throw a fit{Line} if I go in first...)
Monologue.Original: (Selphie might throw a fit{Line} if I go in first...)

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“This is the only train bound for{Line} Deling City anyway.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“This is the only train bound for{Line} Deling City anyway.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“So, what do we do about HIM?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“So, what do we do about HIM?”

Monologue.Current: Irvine{Line}“Selphie, {Char Rinoa}, Quistis...{Line} I don’t know which one to choose...”
Monologue.Original: Irvine{Line}“Selphie, {Char Rinoa}, Quistis...{Line} I don’t know which one to choose...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“I don’t want that Irvine guy using the{Line} guest room. Don’t open it for him!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“I don’t want that Irvine guy using the{Line} guest room. Don’t open it for him!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Shouldn’t you go{Line} check on Selphie?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“Shouldn’t you go{Line} check on Selphie?”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“...Irvine just kind of{Line} went off... Shouldn’t you check?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“...Irvine just kind of{Line} went off... Shouldn’t you check?”

Monologue.Current: Train Announcement{Line}“This train, bound for Deling City,{Line} will be departing shortly.”
Monologue.Original: Train Announcement{Line}“This train, bound for Deling City,{Line} will be departing shortly.”
